description: This file defines a React component for a tools proxy page that enables invoking provider tools via a unified interface. It includes UI elements for selecting provider, tool, tenant, connector, and arguments, as well as handling invocation logic and displaying results or errors.

methods.name: ToolsPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the tools invocation interface and managing state.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Asynchronous function to invoke the selected tool with specified parameters and handle the response or errors.
